title: Home routines don't work while wireless charging
content:
I have various custom routines which activate/deactivate smart lights in my house. While every routine works fine and as intended, i noticed that one specific routine and i would guess every other routine stop working while the phone is charging wirelessly. I just recently bought a wireless charger (pretty good one from Anker) and since then, the routine just won't work... 

I double checked and can confirm the routine works fine while the phone is NOT wireless charging. Does anyone noticed anything similar or even has a fix?

Thanks.
